title: Prisma generate executor
description: The generate command generates assets like Prisma Client based on the generator and data model blocks defined in your schema.prisma file.

schema.description: Specifies the path to the desired schema.prisma file to be processed instead of the default path. Both absolute and relative paths are supported.

data-proxy.description: The generate command will generate Prisma Client for use with the Data Proxy.

watch.description: The generate command will continue to watch the schema.prisma file and re-generate Prisma Client on file changes.
